title: FS: American Beauty, Cycle, EPDG backs
author: aad0906

posts.post_title: FS: American Beauty, Cycle, EPDG backs
posts.post_content:
For sale are some very nice scarce back cards:

Cy Seymour American Beauty SGC 6 (highest graded) price $1,000 SOLD
Bill Carrigan Cycle 350 SGC 7 price $900 SOLD
Jack Quinn Cycle 350 PSA 5 price $350 SOLD
Francis Pfeffer EPDG PSA 5 price $250
Tommy Leach Bending Over Piedmont 350-460 Factory 42 $450 SOLD
Hal Chase Tolstoi PSA 6 (highest graded) $675  SOLD
Pat Moran Cycle 350 SGC 6 (highest graded)  [STRIKE]$625[/STRIKE] $500
The Jack Quin card has been sold.
The Bill Carrigan card has also been sold.

Added T206 Tommy Leach Piedmont 350-460 Factory 42 card, Hal Chase Tolstoi and Pat Moran Cycle 350.

EDIT: well that was fast, the Chase Tolstoi is already sold.
Some more cards sold, lowered price one a remaining card.
